6
7// BinaryStream.h: Provides binary serialization of simple types.
8
9#ifndef LIBANGLE_BINARYSTREAM_H_
10#define LIBANGLE_BINARYSTREAM_H_
11
12#include <stdint.h>
13#include <cstddef>
14#include <string>
15#include <vector>
16
17#include "common/angleutils.h"
18#include "common/mathutil.h"
19
20namespace gl
21{
22template <typename IntT>
23struct PromotedIntegerType
24{
25 using type = typename std::conditional<
26 std::is_signed<IntT>::value,
27 typename std::conditional<sizeof(IntT) <= 4, int32_t, int64_t>::type,
28 typename std::conditional<sizeof(IntT) <= 4, uint32_t, uint64_t>::type>::type;
29};
30
31class BinaryInputStream : angle::NonCopyable
32{
33 public:
34 BinaryInputStream(const void *data, size_t length)
35 {
36 mError = false;
37 mOffset = 0;
38 mData = static_cast<const uint8_t *>(data);
39 mLength = length;
40 }
41
42 // readInt will generate an error for bool types
43 template <class IntT>
44 IntT readInt()
45 {
46 static_assert(!std::is_same<bool, std::remove_cv<IntT>()>(), "Use readBool");
47 using PromotedIntT = typename PromotedIntegerType<IntT>::type;
48 PromotedIntT value = 0;
49 read(&value);
50 ASSERT(angle::IsValueInRangeForNumericType<IntT>(value));
51 return static_cast<IntT>(value);
52 }
53
54 template <class IntT>
55 void readInt(IntT *outValue)
56 {
57 *outValue = readInt<IntT>();
58 }
59
60 template <class IntT, class VectorElementT>
61 void readIntVector(std::vector<VectorElementT> *param)
62 {
63 size_t size = readInt<size_t>();
64 for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
65 {
66 param->push_back(readInt<IntT>());
67 }
68 }
69
70 template <class EnumT>
71 EnumT readEnum()
72 {
73 using UnderlyingType = typename std::underlying_type<EnumT>::type;
74 return static_cast<EnumT>(readInt<UnderlyingType>());
75 }
76
77 template <class EnumT>
78 void readEnum(EnumT *outValue)
79 {
80 *outValue = readEnum<EnumT>();
81 }
82
83 bool readBool()
84 {
85 int value = 0;
86 read(&value);
87 return (value > 0);
88 }
89
90 void readBool(bool *outValue) { *outValue = readBool(); }
91
92 void readBytes(unsigned char outArray[], size_t count) { read<unsigned char>(outArray, count); }
93
94 std::string readString()
95 {
96 std::string outString;
97 readString(&outString);
98 return outString;
99 }
100
101 void readString(std::string *v)
102 {
103 size_t length;
104 readInt(&length);
105
106 if (mError)
107 {
108 return;
109 }
110
111 angle::CheckedNumeric<size_t> checkedOffset(mOffset);
112 checkedOffset += length;
113
114 if (!checkedOffset.IsValid() || mOffset + length > mLength)
115 {
116 mError = true;
117 return;
118 }
119
120 v->assign(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(mData) + mOffset, length);
121 mOffset = checkedOffset.ValueOrDie();
122 }
123
124 void skip(size_t length)
125 {
126 angle::CheckedNumeric<size_t> checkedOffset(mOffset);
127 checkedOffset += length;
128
129 if (!checkedOffset.IsValid() || mOffset + length > mLength)
130 {
131 mError = true;
132 return;
133 }
134
135 mOffset = checkedOffset.ValueOrDie();
136 }
137
138 size_t offset() const { return mOffset; }
139 size_t remainingSize() const
140 {
141 ASSERT(mLength >= mOffset);
142 return mLength - mOffset;
143 }
144
145 bool error() const { return mError; }
146
147 bool endOfStream() const { return mOffset == mLength; }
148
149 const uint8_t *data() { return mData; }
150
151 private:
152 bool mError;
153 size_t mOffset;
154 const uint8_t *mData;
155 size_t mLength;
156
157 template <typename T>
158 void read(T *v, size_t num)
159 {
160 static_assert(std::is_fundamental<T>::value, "T must be a fundamental type.");
161
162 angle::CheckedNumeric<size_t> checkedLength(num);
163 checkedLength *= sizeof(T);
164 if (!checkedLength.IsValid())
165 {
166 mError = true;
167 return;
168 }
169
170 angle::CheckedNumeric<size_t> checkedOffset(mOffset);
171 checkedOffset += checkedLength;
172
173 if (!checkedOffset.IsValid() || checkedOffset.ValueOrDie() > mLength)
174 {
175 mError = true;
176 return;
177 }
178
179 memcpy(v, mData + mOffset, checkedLength.ValueOrDie());
180 mOffset = checkedOffset.ValueOrDie();
181 }
182
183 template <typename T>
184 void read(T *v)
185 {
186 read(v, 1);
187 }
188};
189
190class BinaryOutputStream : angle::NonCopyable
191{
192 public:
193 BinaryOutputStream();
194 ~BinaryOutputStream();
195
196 // writeInt also handles bool types
197 template <class IntT>
198 void writeInt(IntT param)
199 {
200 static_assert(!std::is_same<bool, std::remove_cv<IntT>()>(), "Use writeBool");
201 using PromotedIntT = typename PromotedIntegerType<IntT>::type;
202 ASSERT(angle::IsValueInRangeForNumericType<PromotedIntT>(param));
203 PromotedIntT intValue = static_cast<PromotedIntT>(param);
204 write(&intValue, 1);
205 }
206
207 // Specialized writeInt for values that can also be exactly -1.
208 template <class UintT>
209 void writeIntOrNegOne(UintT param)
210 {
211 if (param == static_cast<UintT>(-1))
212 {
213 writeInt(-1);
214 }
215 else
216 {
217 writeInt(param);
218 }
219 }
220
221 template <class IntT>
222 void writeIntVector(const std::vector<IntT> &param)
223 {
224 writeInt(param.size());
225 for (IntT element : param)
226 {
227 writeIntOrNegOne(element);
228 }
229 }
230
231 template <class EnumT>
232 void writeEnum(EnumT param)
233 {
234 using UnderlyingType = typename std::underlying_type<EnumT>::type;
235 writeInt<UnderlyingType>(static_cast<UnderlyingType>(param));
236 }
237
238 void writeString(const std::string &v)
239 {
240 writeInt(v.length());
241 write(v.c_str(), v.length());
242 }
243
244 void writeBytes(const unsigned char *bytes, size_t count) { write(bytes, count); }
245
246 void writeBool(bool value)
247 {
248 int intValue = value ? 1 : 0;
249 write(&intValue, 1);
250 }
251
252 size_t length() const { return mData.size(); }
253
254 const void *data() const { return mData.size() ? &mData[0] : nullptr; }
255
256 const std::vector<uint8_t> &getData() const { return mData; }
257
258 private:
259 template <typename T>
260 void write(const T *v, size_t num)
261 {
262 static_assert(std::is_fundamental<T>::value, "T must be a fundamental type.");
263 const char *asBytes = reinterpret_cast<const char *>(v);
264 mData.insert(mData.end(), asBytes, asBytes + num * sizeof(T));
265 }
266
267 std::vector<uint8_t> mData;
268};
269
270inline BinaryOutputStream::BinaryOutputStream() {}
271
272inline BinaryOutputStream::~BinaryOutputStream() = default;
273
274} // namespace gl
275
276#endif // LIBANGLE_BINARYSTREAM_H_
277
